title: Compare multiple classification models with caret
description: This R code will compare multiple R models (10s..100s)  using the caret wrapper library. The example given here is for fast and accurate performers. Model list https://topepo.github.io/caret/available-models.html Some of the better performers are then averaged to improve the LB score from (meager) 0.49574 to the somewhat better ensemble model LB score: 0.13357.
description_lemmatized: r code compare multiple r model 10s100s using caret wrapper library example given fast accurate performer model list httpstopepogithubiocaretavailablemodelshtml better performer averaged improve lb score meager 049574 somewhat better ensemble model lb score 013357
